comments.body: In case of Scala 3 we get additional reference for Descriptor.Type when using main methods, so we can use that. In the future it could change to a method, but that depends on the changes in Dotty.
Would `Option` not be enough at least here?
actually, I've made it a List motivated by your idea to report multiple source targets https://github.com/scalameta/metals/pull/1466#discussion_r384661635
Ach, nvm. I just thought it's `toList` from Option. Nevermind then :sweat_smile:

Docstring proposal

> Manages in-memory index of main/test class symbols grouped by their enclosing build targets.
